name: e-Psychiatry
0:
”Alexa, open e. psychiatry”
”Alexa, ask e. psychiatry for my messages”
”Alexa, start e. Psychiatry”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: e. psychiatry
Developer Terms of Use
des: Since 2007, e-Psychiatry has been the national leader in tele-psychiatry and tele-therapy services. e-Psychiatry’s web-based, e-PsychiatryPro telepsych platform monitors and responds to users’ mental health and substance use conditions 24/7, providing thousands of low-cost psychiatrists, nurse practitioners, psychologists, social workers and therapists in all 50 states, who offer express appointments for medications management, therapy and consults through e-Psychiatry’s HIPAA secure, hi-resolution e-PsychiatryPro videoconference platform, phone, and messaging. In addition, e-Psychiatry offers thousands of hi-tech, low/no cost apps, guides, FAQs, videos, and other helpful resources that are matched to users’ needs, and delivered over the lifetime of the user as needed to support their return to emotional wellness. e-Psychiatry invites Alexa users to load the e-Psychiatry skill for home use, and to join other users nationwide who trust e-Psychiatry where we are revolutionising the science of behavioural health through technology one planet at a time.
